thread.section_title: Low Cost Funeral Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of low-cost-funeral.co.uk
thread.title: simonjulianpage
thread.title_full: Low Cost Funeral reviewed by simonjulianpage

author: simonjulianpage
title: simonjulianpage
text:
When you are at your most upset, it is difficult to talk about money. But afterwards it is something that I have looked back on and thought - Oh that was expensive.
Not with Low Cost Funerals. Do not be afraid to think about getting good value for money. Low Cost Funerals is a superb funeral at a fair price. Nothing was too much trouble and everything was so easy. But above all else, the venue was really nice and the staff made you feel very welcoming. I cannot praise them enough.
